1.title: Episode 1
1.caption: Ahn Eun-young enters the forbidden basement as Hong In-pyo reluctantly trails along. They join hands when a dark secret shakes up the school.

2.title: Episode 2
2.caption: When the bond between two troublemaking students catches Eun-young's eye, In-pyo proposes unconventional ideas to split and keep them apart.

3.title: Episode 3
3.caption: Eun-young and In-pyo get knotty behind closed doors. With Mackenzieâ€™s support, a student settles the score with the basketball team.
